summary: The diff implements a pointer/touch-capable fleeing behavior for the “No” button and removes any overlay usage from `App.tsx`, but it also introduces/retains an unrelated dialog (`DeploymentDomainDialog`) that was not requested in the BuildRequest. The `NoConfirmationOverlay` component file still exists (and contains the old overlay strings per the summaries), though it does not appear to be imported/exported in the shown changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/rendered `DeploymentDomainDialog` (a dialog/popup UI) in the main App footer, unrelated to the fleeing “No” button requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is specifically about removing the “No” confirmation overlay and making the “No” button flee on mobile/desktop; it does not request adding any new dialogs or deployment-domain UI.
